From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

OOC: JP, the lock down on the council base, is still active. How did you
get out?

::Hot Rod/Demolition::

Several shots hit the water above him. He continued on his way. 

Suddenly he is hit by several bullets. He looks up to see Demolition. He
fires off a rocket that hits Demo.

"Figures..." States Demolition, as he crashes into the water.

Hot Rod fires another rocket that blasts Demolition deep under the sea
floor.

Hot Rod continues on his way.
